translations: v．使陷入泥潭，使陷入困境：使陷入泥泞的地面或困难的境地。

sentences.sentence: There are two schools of thought: first, that Russia sought to weaken the United States by stirring up uncertainty and miring Mrs. Clinton, who seemed all but certain to win, in scandal;
sentences.translation: 现在有两派观点：第一派观点认为，俄罗斯试图通过制造不确定性，并用丑闻来给看似稳操胜券的克林顿带来麻烦，以此削弱美国；
